translated: The Questions of King Milinda🔽The Questions of the Wanderer Sakuludāyī
The Questions of the Elder Sāriputta

original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘sālakalyāṇikāya ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena sāla kalyāṇikāya ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti yam vadesi katamam tam ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti
translated: “Revered Nāgasena, when you say that one quality of the sāla-tree creeper should be adopted, which is that one quality that should be adopted?”

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, sālakalyāṇikā nāma antopathaviyaṁyeva abhivaḍḍhati hatthasatampi bhiyyopi;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja sālakalyāṇikā nāma antopathaviyayā iva abhivaḍḍhati hattha satampi bhiyyopi
translated: “As, sire, the sāla-tree creeper grows only in the interior of the earth and spreads out to a hundred hands and more,

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena cattāri sāmaññaphalāni catasso paṭisambhidā chaḷabhiññāyo kevalañca samaṇadhammaṁ suññāgāreyeva paripūrayitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena cattāri sāmañña phalāni catasso paṭisambhidā chaḍ abhiññāyo kevalam ca samaṇa dhammam suññāgāreya iva paripūrayitabba
translated: even so, sire, the one who is devoted to mental training should fulfil in an empty place the four fruits of spiritual life, the four discriminations, the six super-knowledges and the whole spiritual life of an ascetic.

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, sālakalyāṇikāya ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: mahā rāja sāla kalyāṇikāya ekam aṅgam
translated: This, sire, is the one quality of the sāla-tree creeper that should be adopted.
And this, sire, was said by the Elder Rāhula:
“The sāla-tree creeper,🔽Which grows on the earth,
Grows only in the interior of the earth
And spreads out to a hundred hands.
In the same way, Great Hero,
like Sālakalyāṇī,🔽I’ve increased in the Dhamma
The Discussion of the Sālakaliṅga Branch is the fourth.
